div.p: WWARN is committed to ensuring that all data contributors receive credit for their work. We ask that you provide details for any individuals and institutions whose contribution to this study should be acknowledged. There is no restriction on the number of acknowledgements but we advise that you follow the guidelines of the International Committee of Medical Journal Editors .
The names of acknowledged individuals and institutions will appear in the order that youâ€™ve provided in the study details displayed in the WWARN Explorer.
You can update this information at any time by logging into the WWARN website, navigating to this study in the Data home and clicking the Acknowledgements tab.
